sentence.Network_en: The ruffian threatened to run his victim through if he did not hand over all his money.
sentence.Network_cn: 暴徒恐吓受害者说如果他不把所有的钱都交出来,就捅死他.

sentence.Network_en: He himself was a bad commander, a boaster and ruffian.
sentence.Network_cn: 他本人是个弊脚的指挥官, 会吹牛皮,又粗鲁残暴.

sentence.Network_en: The doctor struck out suddenly and stretched the ruffian on the ground.
sentence.Network_cn: 医生突然伸手打他,把这个坏蛋打倒在地下.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 松松：3天背完GRE难词 ... saunter ：n.vi. 闲逛, 漫步 26。 ruffian ：n. 流氓, 恶棍, 无赖 ribald ：adj. 下流的 28。.
暴字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 暴跳〖 stampwithfury〗 暴徒〖 bandit;brute;ruffian;thug〗 暴行〖 savageact〗.
痞字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 痞里痞气〖 slovenly〗 痞子〖 ruffian〗 痞棍〖 ruffian;cod〗.

list.abs: 在线字典：土字的含义、土字的笔划、土字的意义、... ... [local ruffian] 土货 [local product;native produce] 本地出产的物品.
When the ruffians attacked him , he laid about them vigorously ., 当歹徒攻击他时 , 他奋勇地跟他们搏斗.
After the event , old ruffian gave A a few candy ., 事后 , 老光棍给了 A 几粒糖果.
[young ruffian] 品行恶劣的年轻无赖偷儒(懦)惮事,无廉耻而嗜乎饮食,则可谓恶少者矣。--《荀子.修身》 恶舌è shé [vicious language] 恶毒的语言恶.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from Old French ruffian, from Italian ruffiano, perhaps from dialect rofia 'scab, scurf', of Germanic origin

entry.def: A ruffian is a man who behaves violently and is involved in crime.

example.ex: ...gangs of ruffians who lurk about intent on troublemaking.
example.tran: 潜伏在周围意图制造麻烦的匪帮

auth_sentence.content: Bravados and spirited actions any street ruffian can do.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bravados and spirited actions any street ruffian can do.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bravados and spirited actions any street ruffian can do.

auth_sentence.content: It was David Fowler, a ruffian he says Watts used to carry out a lot of his dirty work.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was David Fowler, a ruffian he says Watts used to carry out a lot of his dirty work.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was David Fowler, a ruffian he says Watts used to carry out a lot of his dirty work.

auth_sentence.content: Security is necessary "to keep the undesirables out—usually some ruffian at each big event, " says Mr. Schlachter, 32.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Security is necessary "to keep the undesirables out—usually some ruffian at each big event, " says Mr. Schlachter, 32.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词和形容词,"……地方,……人或动物等"; 2. ……的

republic共和国+an……地方,……人或动物等→adj.共和的
Rom+an……地方,……人或动物等→n.古罗马人 adj.罗马的
ruffi=brutal残忍的,兽性的+an……地方,……人或动物等→n.恶棍,歹徒 adj.残暴的
sub下面+urban城市的→城市下面→城市之外的→郊区的
urb城市+an表示地方→adj.城市的,市内的
veter+an……地方,……人或动物等→n.老兵,老手;老兵的; adj.经验丰富的
Americ美国,美洲+an……地方,……人或动物等→adj.美洲的 n.美国人
amphi两个,两种+bi生命+an……地方,……人或动物等→两个生命→两栖动物
parti=party党,一部分人+s+an人→党人→党徒

ruffi=brutal残忍的,兽性的+an……地方,……人或动物等→n.恶棍,歹徒 adj.残暴的

sentences.en: Some local ruffians are responsible for this.
sentences.cn: 某些当地歹徒应负此责。

sentences.en: The ruffian threatened to run his victim through if he did not hand over all his money.
sentences.cn: 暴徒恐吓受害者说如果他不把所有的钱都交出来,就捅死他。
